articles.author: Alli Rosenbloom
articles.title: Halle Bailey and Fantasia Barrino star in the first trailer for new ‘The Color Purple’ movie - CNN
articles.description: Halle Bailey and Fantasia Barrino made their official debut on Monday in the first trailer for the upcoming “The Color Purple” movie, a musical reboot of the 1985 classic, based on the novel of the same name by Alice Walker.
